# Battle of Cold Harbor order of battle: Union

The following Union Army units and commanders fought in the Battle of Cold Harbor (May 31â€“June 12, 1864) of the American Civil War. The Confederate order of battle is listed separately. Order of battle compiled from the army organization May 31, 1864, army organization May 26-June 3, 1864, the casualty returns and the reports.
Abbreviations used
Military Rank
* LTG = Lieutenant General
* MG = Major General
* BG = Brigadier General
* Col = Colonel
* Ltc = Lieutenant Colonel
* Maj = Major
* Cpt = Captain
Other
* w = wounded
* mw = mortally wounded
* k = killed in action
* c = captured
